name: Stratus
description: Unlimited low, low clouds for one low, low price!

name: Altostratus
description: Our translucent altostratus clouds are fully capable of masking the sun, with colour options ranging from uniform grey to blush-green.

name: Cumulus
description: Naturally fluffy up top and lovingly flattened on the base, our cumulus clouds are the ideal decoration for fair-weather skies.
